comment.author: 38936533@N06
comment._content: In the foreground is the XC-99 model. Even more interesting is the model behind and to the left. Basically a reworked B-36 Peacemaker with swept wings and 8 Pratt and Whitney J57 jet engines, Convair proposed this aircraft to the Air Force as the YB-60. Two aircraft were built, but the faster and better flying Boeing B-52 Stratofortress won the contract.

comment.author: 110778519@N03
comment._content: I remember the model being in storage.  I don't know what happened to it.
